column5: Decided to change things up and get me some perchies from the mighty Niagara. We managed to get a few small carp.  And we managed to find some quality fish despite the slow bite. Just had to be patient.
Nice feed there Bruce. Funny though I've never seen a perch with whiskers before
If Robert gets a cat in spring time, I can guarantee it's coming home for dinner. Especially if its Dad's "turn" to clean fish (it's almost always Dad's "turn")
